title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 8.6 - Road tests in cases of substantial highway risk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 8.6 - Road tests in cases of substantial highway risk

State Regulations

If a hearing officer of the department or the commissioner
or his designated agent determine that the applicant has had an accident, incident or conviction, or a series of accidents, incidents or convictions
which tend to establish that the person may pose a substantial highway risk, and that a road test is necessary to determine whether the person may safely
operate and control a motor vehicle, then such road test may be conducted by
the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
8.6

Amended, New

York State Register August 27, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 34, eff. 8/27/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
